sourcesContent:
const constants = {
  // Story module numbers
  MODULE_INCIDENT: 1, // AA

  INCIDENT_STARTING_KEY: 'AA000AA000AA',

  // Point boost values for power, intellect, love, etc. for decisions
  POINT_BOOST_SMALL: 1,
  POINT_BOOST_MEDIUM: 2,
  POINT_BOOST_LARGE: 4,
  POINT_BOOST_LARGE02: 8,
  POINT_BOOST_HUGE: 12,
  POINT_BOOST_JACKPOT: 25,

  // Point costs for decisions
  POINT_COST_MINI_01: 1,
  POINT_COST_MINI_02: 3,
  POINT_COST_MINI_03: 5,

  POINT_COST_MODERATE_01: 10,
  POINT_COST_MODERATE_02: 15,
  POINT_COST_MODERATE_03: 20,

  POINT_COST_HEAVY_01: 30,
  POINT_COST_HEAVY_02: 40,
  POINT_COST_HEAVY_03: 50,

  POINT_COST_MEGA_01: 75,
  POINT_COST_MEGA_02: 100,
  POINT_COST_MEGA_03: 150,

  LINE_BREAK_SEPARATOR: '\n\n',
  LINK_NODE_PREFIX: 'X',
  FAIL_KEY: 'FAIL',
  END_KEY: 'END',
  CONTINUE_TEXT: 'Continue...',
  FAIL_TEXT: 'You failed to solve the issue ,may be next time things will be different.',
  END_TEXT: 'Finished',
  END_CHOICE: 'Return to menu...'
};

export default constants;
